attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
not to play 39 league games

the 39th game being abroad.. we dont want that as fans will have to cash out alot of money and the idea of playing 1 team 3 times and the top 4 not being able 2 play each other is wrong!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
